name: Day of Despair [Alpha]
description:
It's the end of the world, many Cities and Towns are getting Nuked! You have 5 minutes to get in, scavenge and get out before the Nukes land! 

Game Info

-In Day of Despair, you will be rewarded for successfully scavenging and surviving. Yet you will be putting everything on the line. Whether if you're killed by hostile enemies or fail to extract. You will lose everything you've brought in!

Extra Info

-Day of Despair is a little project I wanted to work on and have been for the past month and is currently in the Alpha stage. I will be updating the game and adding more upon request and activity!

-Also if you enjoy Survival games, check out my other game "Desperation" that I've been working on and can be purchased on Steam! store! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1617360/Desperation/
